articles.title: "Aap Karo Toh Chamatkar...": Virender Sehwag's Sharp Verdict On '107 Overs' Test | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Virender Sehwag gave his trademark witty verdict on India's win over South Africa in the second Test match in Cape Town that lasted for just 107 overs.

articles.title: Iyer chapter to end when Pant returns: How IND's SA series will shape Test XI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India managed to draw a Test series in South Africa for just the second time, with the previous instance coming in 2010/11 | Cricket
